input.sentences: [male] hated the long trek to the local boat shop but he loved to fish .
he arrived and grabbed the same boat he always used .
he took the anchor off the boat from the dock .
he rode the boat far up the stream and past the giant overgrown tree that pokes over the stream .
[male] arrives at his favorite fishing spot near the wild looking tree that touches the water .
output.sentences: The gully looked both wild and beautiful in the afternoon light after our long walk.
Scrambling over the rocks and pushing through the long grass was not easy, but it was worth it to get to the docks and the boats.
The distant, looming hills and the huge, fluffly clouds were like two herds of giant, passive beasts and we grabbed ourselves a boat to get a closer look.
The clouds and the water were starting to look a bit ominous, but we felt like an adventure and pushed off anyway.
The current was not so very hard to ride and we got to land and docked beneath a large, overhanging tree.
